name: D'don D'don ROCK
description:
Two players go head-to-head in this endurance test to dodge bullets and last as long as possible. You start with ONE life. Get hit and you're done.

CONTROLS:

P1 - 

Movement: Joystick (WASD)

P2 - 

Movement: Joystick (Arrow Keys)

Misc. - 

Quit: MENU (Esc)

CREDITS:

Brendan Conlin - Art, Primary Programmer

Jonathan Arel - UI, Secondary Programmer

MADE FOR FSU'S ARCADE CABINET.
